mapper.sql: ID, KEYWORD_NAME, KEYWORD_PINYIN, ABBREV, SYNONYMS, NEAR, TYPOS, HYPERNYM, HYPONYM, RELATED, DOMAIN, TYPE, DEFINITION, SCORE, WEIGHT, SENSITIVITY, POPULARITY, ENABLED, CREATION_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFICATION_DATE, MODIFIER
mapper.insert: insert into KBS_KEYWORD (ID, KEYWORD_NAME, KEYWORD_PINYIN, ABBREV, SYNONYMS, NEAR, TYPOS, HYPERNYM, HYPONYM, RELATED, DOMAIN, TYPE, DEFINITION, SCORE, WEIGHT, SENSITIVITY, POPULARITY, ENABLED, CREATION_DATE, CREATOR, MODIFICATION_DATE, MODIFIER) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{keywordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{keywordPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abbrev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{near,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hypernym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hyponym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{related,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{domain,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{definition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sensitivity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{popularity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into KBS_KEYWORD
ID,
KEYWORD_NAME,
KEYWORD_PINYIN,
ABBREV,
SYNONYMS,
NEAR,

HYPERNYM,
HYPONYM,

TYPE,

WEIGHT,

CREATION_DATE,
CREATOR,
MODIFICATION_DATE,
MODIFIER,

mapper.update:
update KBS_KEYWORD
KEYWORD_NAME = #{keywordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
KEYWORD_PINYIN = #{keywordPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ABBREV = #{abbrev,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYNONYMS = #{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NEAR = #{near,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPOS = #{typos,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HYPERNYM = #{hypernym,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
HYPONYM = #{hyponym,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RELATED = #{related,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DOMAIN = #{domain,jdbcType=TINYINT},
TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT},
DEFINITION = #{definition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SENSITIVITY = #{sensitivity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
POPULARITY = #{popularity,jdbcType=INTEGER},
ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFICATION_DATE = #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update KBS_KEYWORD set KEYWORD_NAME = #{keywordName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, KEYWORD_PINYIN = #{keywordPinyin,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ABBREV = #{abbrev,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYNONYMS = #{synonyms,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NEAR = #{near,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPOS = #{typos,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HYPERNYM = #{hypernym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HYPONYM = #{hyponym,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RELATED = #{related,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DOMAIN = #{domain,jdbcType=TINYINT}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, DEFINITION = #{definition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCORE = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, WEIGHT = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SENSITIVITY = #{sensitivity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, POPULARITY = #{popularity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ENABLED = #{enabled,jdbcType=TINYINT}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFICATION_DATE = #{modificationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFIER = #{modifier,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM KBS_KEYWORD ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first}, ${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_KEYWORD WHERE CREATION_DATE >= #{lastCreateTime} ORDER BY CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_KEYWORD WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE > CREATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
SELECT * FROM KBS_KEYWORD WHERE MODIFICATION_DATE >= #{lastUpdateTime} ORDER BY MODIFICATION_DATE LIMIT ${first},${pageSize}
